text: was a town located in Yūfutsu (Iburi) District, Iburi Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of 2005, the town had an estimated population of 3,981 and a density of 48.24 persons per km². The total area was 82.52 km². On March 27, 2006, Oiwake was merged with the town of Hayakita (also from Yufutsu (Iburi) District) to create the new town of Abira. ==External links== * Abira official website Category:Dissolved municipalities of Hokkaido
title: Oiwake, Hokkaido
